info.name: LA7 Essenziale Forte (by Atino Core)
info.description:
LA7 TV Diretta senza Banner Pubblicitari, links, social, etc... solo lo streaming tv. Other Styles: [see all]
■ - Yahoo! Mail Minimal ■ - Yahoo! Mail Minimal Zero ■ - Yahoo! Mail Zero Carbonella ■ - Yahoo! Mail Minimal One ■ - Rai TV Streaming ■ - LIBERO Mail ZERO ■ - LIBERO Mail ZERO CARBONELLA ■ - Speed Test OOKLA cleaner
info.additionalInfo: April 2016. Tested on FireFox and Chrome (with or without AdBlock) works fine. This version displays LA7 TV Screen. No advertising box, no site-bar, no logo, no navigation tabs. suitable for your tablets, notebooks and netbooks, for an easy and clear LA7 TV Streaming . PLEASE Report any problems or suggestions here. thanks. PS: this script does not remove an eventual pre-stream advertising ..use AdBlock to(o)!
